name: DROP TILL YOU STOP
description:
In the year 2059, The Extreme Professional Sporting League have made the switch to digital format, known to the world as THE THIRD DIMENSION. Presented to viewers as the most extreme of sports and presented to players as the safest of sports. Little did the know of THE DANGERS OF THE THIRD DIMENSION.

----------------------------

Ground Controls:

AD to move side to side

WS to speed up/slow down

SPACE to jump

Click to shoot

----------------------------

Air Controls:

WASD to move Up/Left/Down/Right

Made By Jeven & JackL

Audio:

DaGrahamCraka - Runaway

8bitcypher - Byte Me
